'''Treasure Hunter of the Shimmering Woods''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Sumeru: The Rainforest of Lore]]''. The achievements are earned by opening treasure chests in [[Avidya Forest]], [[Lokapala Jungle]], [[Ardravi Valley]], [[Ashavan Realm]], [[Vissudha Field]], [[Lost Nursery]], and [[Vanarana (Area)|Vanarana]].
